name: HttpService
description: Provides HTTP utilities like URL building, request formatting, file upload, and handling fetch requests.
author: Team Shunya.ek

actions.name: urlBuilder
actions.description: Builds a complete URL with query parameters.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Base URL to which parameters will be appended.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Query parameters to be appended to the URL.

actions.name: requestBuilder
actions.description: Constructs a request object for fetch API.

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Headers to be included in the request.

actions.name: fetchRequest
actions.description: Performs a fetch request using the provided URL and request object.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to which the request is sent.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request object as per fetch API specifications.

actions.name: buildEncodedUri
actions.description: Encodes a given object into URI format.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Object containing data to be encoded into URI format.

actions.name: unbuildEndodedUri
actions.description: Decodes a URI formatted string back into an object.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: URI formatted string to be decoded.
